name: MindSweeper
storyline:
Mind Sweeper, it is a game that combines Minesweeper and RPG element.

The world is invaded by disaster, disaster brings chaos, chaos turns creatures into monsters...
As a hero, you need to use your unique senses to find chaos, defeat monsters, and ultimately protect the world from disaster.

Use minesweeper way to explore the map and interacting with special objects on the map.
You can also collect monsters with different abilities to strengthen your team and defeat the boss.
summary: Mind Sweeper, it is a game that combines Minesweeper and RPG element. Use minesweeper way to explore the map. Collect monsters to strengthen your team and defeat the boss.
